com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowMapActivity

java.lang.Object
  com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContext
      com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContextWrapper
          com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowActivity
              com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowMapActivity

@Implements(value=com.google.android.maps.MapActivity.class)
public class ShadowMapActivity
extends ShadowActivity

Shadow MapActivity that registers and unregisters a BroadcastReciever when onResume() and onPause() are called respectively.
